metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8855 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
wolfSSL before 3.11.0 does not prevent wc_DhAgree from accepting a malformed DH key.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8855` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwolfssl15 - 3.13.0+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.13.0+dfsg-1').
